name: Chef's Kiss
description: A full-stack app that allows users to search for restaurants in a given area, save a restaurant to a list, and add their own impressions.

name: Mingo
description: A minimalist, text-based app (inspired by Twitter) that allows for users to create subject-based posts and respond with comments.

name: Blackjack
description: A basic Blackjack game coded using object-oriented programming.
